-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public."softcartDimDate"
(
    dateid integer NOT NULL,
    day integer NOT NULL,
    weekday integer NOT NULL,
    weekdayname character varying(20)[] NOT NULL,
    year integer NOT NULL,
    month integer NOT NULL,
    monthname character varying(20)[] NOT NULL,
    quarter integer NOT NULL,
    quartername character varying(2)[] NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (dateid)
);

CREATE TABLE public."softcartDimCategory"
(
    catid integer NOT NULL,
    category character varying(50)[] NOT NULL,
    itemid integer NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (catid)
);

CREATE TABLE public."softcartDimItem"
(
    itemid integer NOT NULL,
    itemname character varying(100)[] NOT NULL,
    itemdescription character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    price money NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (itemid)
);

CREATE TABLE public."softcartDimCountry"
(
    countryid integer NOT NULL,
    country character varying(100)[] NOT NULL,
    stateprovince character varying(100)[],
    city character varying(100)[] NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (countryid)
);

CREATE TABLE public."softcartFactSales"
(
    factid integer NOT NULL,
    dateid integer NOT NULL,
    catid integer NOT NULL,
    countryid integer NOT NULL,
    totalsales money NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (factid)
);

ALTER TABLE public."softcartFactSales"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (dateid)
    REFERENCES public."softcartDimDate" (dateid)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."softcartDimCategory"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (itemid)
    REFERENCES public."softcartDimItem" (itemid)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."softcartFactSales"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (countryid)
    REFERENCES public."softcartDimCountry" (countryid)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public."softcartFactSales"
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (catid)
    REFERENCES public."softcartDimCategory" (catid)
    NOT VALID;

END;
